execution_quality: Efficient execution with good error recovery; agent quickly identified the affected code, made necessary changes, and validated them with testing.
work_category: Configuration refactoring to change a command-line flag from optional to default behavior in a Guix-based grocery list application.
summary: Agent successfully fixed an issue and applied the --remote flag as requested, then immediately received a follow-up task to make that flag the default. The work was focused, technically sound, and completed efficiently with good error handling. User's follow-up request suggests satisfaction with the approach and desire to continue iterating on the same feature.
follow_up_pattern: User provided a new, related task ('make --remote the default') indicating they want to continue refining the feature in the same direction.
